content: Those are all great ideas! I think I'll go with the asparagus and prosciutto wraps and the spring pea and mint bruschetta. They both sound light and refreshing, and they'll complement the flavors in the spring vegetable tart nicely. Do you have any suggestions on how to incorporate fresh herbs into my cocktails? I've been experimenting with different herbs in my cooking class, and I think they could add a really interesting element to my drinks.
